channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Gonzo Plan To Beat China With Giant Robot Boats
item.description: Autonomous speedboat designer Saronic aims to use its fat warchest to build America’s largest shipyard and help the US to dominate commercial and mili...

item.title: Thermal Master’s Launches Latest P3 Thermal Imaging Camera For iPhone And Android
item.description: This compact thermal camera is designed for electronics and other applications where heat maps are needed. The P3 has a range of -20 – 600°C with an a...

item.title: Medicaid Cuts May Already Be Impacting Hospitals
item.description: The One Big Beautiful Bill may lead to 16 million Medicaid/ACA enrollees losing coverage. Hospitals in turn will have reduced revenue and higher uncom...

item.title: London’s Walking Plans Stalled. Rethinking Roads, Ebikes And Toilets May Help
item.description: London had big plans for boosting walking trips, but so far progress has stalled. Claiming back road space, solving ebike parking and more toilets cou...

item.title: Samsung Electronics, SK Hynix Shares Soar On OpenAI’s Korean Data Center Push
item.description: OpenAI, run by billionaire Sam Altman, unveiled a raft of strategic partnerships in South Korea to support its $500 billion Stargate initiative.

item.title: Reciprocity
item.description: Our biggest commitments, the things we are most dedicated to, rarely pay us back in equal measure. That might be the point.

item.title: Recalculating the cost of convenience

item.title: “Because I said so”

item.title: Acceleration is felt, velocity is ignored
item.description: On an airplane, we notice even tiny changes in acceleration (including direction) but we’re completely unaware that we’re traveling at hundreds of mil...

item.title: Act now!
item.description: Start where you are. Start with what you’ve got. Start now. Now is the perfect moment. It only feels ‘fast’ if we’re rushing. Don’t rush. But act. Wit...
